EmailTemplate.name: 2020_EMEAI_HOC_MC.Invitation Email Non-Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us: 2020 Honeywell Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Honeywell is pleased to announce our annual Operators Conference will be held in Prague, Czech Republic on the 3rd-5th of March at the Corinthia Hotel. Please register with the link below and let's begin to Work on Tomorrow, Today!
We have created an engaging agenda where Honeywell will share the latest news, industry trends and technology innovations from a variety of our experts. Below are three reasons you should join us in Prague:
Honeywell Technical Updates Engage with Honeywell product support experts to review product updates across key Honeywell systems
Technology Updates and Honeywell Forge Strategies Meet with our Customer and Product Support team, who will present the latest in safety/flight efficiency and connected maintenance and future roadmap towards greener APU’s
Feedback Forums Our AOG, Honeywell Aerospace Trading, and Integrated Supply Chain leaders will be there for you to address your questions and share thoughts
When: March 3rd - 5th 2020
Time: 8:00 - 17:45
Where: Prague, Czech Republic Corinthia Hotel
Please Note: March 3rd is reserved for individual customer meetings so please be sure to make direct reservations with your dedicated Honeywell Customer Account Manager.
We look forward to seeing you in Prague!
Honeywell Events Team REGISTER NOW AND REVIEW AGENDA <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/03/cps-airline-conference]]>
